mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows FROM ( SELECT template_code, template_name, COUNT(template_code) FROM carrier_template GROUP BY template_code, template_name ) AS subquery;
SELECT template_code, template_name, COUNT(template_code) as template_count, last_updated_datetime FROM carrier_template ct GROUP BY template_code, template_name LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT tc.template_coordinate_id, tc.template_code, tc.template_type, tc.template_image_order, tc.template_coordinate_name, tc.template_input_type, tc.template_input_option, tc.font_style, tc.font_size, tc.coordinate_x_axis, tc.coordinate_y_axis, CONCAT(ct.template_code, '/', ct.template_image_name) AS template_image_path, last_updated_datetime, registered_datetime FROM template_coordinate tc INNER JOIN carrier_template ct ON tc.template_code = ct.template_code AND tc.template_image_order = ct.template_image_order WHERE tc.template_code = #{templateCode}

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '고객구분' THEN 1 END) AS customer_type_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '고객정보' THEN 1 END) AS customer_info_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '요금제' THEN 1 END) AS mobile_carrier_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '가입비 및 유심정보' THEN 1 END) AS sim_info_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '결제정보' THEN 1 END) AS payment_info_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '법정대리인' THEN 1 END) AS legal_representative_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '부가기능' THEN 1 END) AS additional_function_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '판매자정보' THEN 1 END) AS seller_info_count, COUNT(CASE WHEN tc.template_type = '공통체크' THEN 1 END) AS common_info_count FROM template_coordinate tc WHERE tc.template_code = #{templateCode}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY registered_datetime) AS row_num, carrier_template_id, template_code, template_name, template_image_order, template_image_name, last_updated_datetime, registered_datetime FROM carrier_template WHERE template_code = #{templateCode} ORDER BY template_image_order ASC
